title: ATLAS - ESTIMATIVE, ADVICE & STATEMENT FREQUENCY CODE UPDATE

task_list.instruction_title:
**Execute SQL Query to be sure we will not produce any statement SGPBS BANK During EOW**

**Mise à jour du code fréquence des clients migrés (passage à \"pas d'édition\")**
REQUETES PRESENTES SOUS :
\Clients\Client_data\requete maj code fréquence.sql 

**1ere requete** : _Nombre de records a updater_
select count(*) from  nhdbo.t_client cli
where (cli.nbr_co_0145,  cli.nbr_client_0145) in (
select cli2.nbr_co_0145, cli2.nbr_client_0145 from nhdbo.t_fu_client fucli, nhdbo.t_client cli2
where fucli.nbr_co_1057 = cli2.nbr_co_0145
and fucli.nbr_client_1057 = cli2.nbr_client_0145)

**2eme requête :**_ Requete d'update - CODE_FREQ_STMT_
update nhdbo.t_client cli
set cli.code_freq_stmt_0145 = 9 
where (cli.nbr_co_0145,  cli.nbr_client_0145) in (
select cli2.nbr_co_0145, cli2.nbr_client_0145 from nhdbo.t_fu_client fucli, nhdbo.t_client cli2
where fucli.nbr_co_1057 = cli2.nbr_co_0145
and fucli.nbr_client_1057 = cli2.nbr_client_0145)

**Sélection des clients migrés qui ont un code fréquence PORT différent de 0 (WITHOUT)**
REQUETES PRESENTES SOUS :
\Clients\Client_data\ requete maj code fréquence.sql 

**1ere requete :** _Nombre de records a updater_
select count(*) from nhdbo.t_fu_client fucli, nhdbo.t_client cli
where fucli.nbr_co_1057 = cli.nbr_co_0145
and fucli.nbr_client_1057 = cli.nbr_client_0145
and cli.code_freq_port_0145 <> 0;
--
**2eme requête **: _Requete d'update - CODE_FREQ_PORT_
update nhdbo.t_client cli
set cli.code_freq_port_0145 = 0 
where (cli.nbr_co_0145,  cli.nbr_client_0145) in (
select cli2.nbr_co_0145, cli2.nbr_client_0145 from nhdbo.t_fu_client fucli, nhdbo.t_client cli2
where fucli.nbr_co_1057 = cli2.nbr_co_0145
and fucli.nbr_client_1057 = cli2.nbr_client_0145
and cli2.code_freq_port_0145 <> 0);
